trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The forthright farmer has a mystery to share.
TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the forthright farmer.
TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_TODO_01<tab>Investigate the cliffs around the Clave.
TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the forthright farmer.
TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_TODO_03<tab>/soothe the forthright farmer.
TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the forthright farmer.

TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_SERIOUSMAN03356_000_001<tab>Excuse me, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>! You seem the well-traveled sort. Would you be willing to accompany me to the Clave in return for a reward?

TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_SERIOUSMAN03356_000_002<tab>There's a bit of a problem, see. We take turns manning the watchtowers hereabouts, but the last few folk have been driven away from the lighthouse post by sudden and terrible headaches.

TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_SERIOUSMAN03356_000_003<tab>Every single one of them remembers hearing some sort of “screeching wail.” We don't know if we're dealing with a sea witch or a roaming banshee, but they all agree the sound is awful enough to chill your blood!
TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_SERIOUSMAN03356_000_004<tab>How fortunate for me, then, that I have you to back me up! Pray follow me to the Clave, and we can solve this mystery together...
TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_SERIOUSMAN03356_000_010<tab>Hmph, I don't hear anything...
TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_SERIOUSMAN03356_000_011<tab>Maybe we should split up and have more of a look around. Once you're satisfied there's naught to find, you can meet me back here at the lighthouse.
TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>You think you hear a faint noise...but maybe you imagined it.
TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>The waters here swell and crash with cacophonous violence, rivaling the stormy seas of La Noscea...
TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>You hear nothing but the lapping of the waves...
TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_SERIOUSMAN03356_000_030<tab>I heard it...that terrible voice! Aaargh! The pain! I can feel my head...splitting in half...

TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>The farmer seems to be in no state to talk. Perhaps you can <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>soothe<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> him with a few calming words...
TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_SERIOUSMAN03356_000_040<tab>I... I think I might live, thank you... That keening din seemed to pierce my very skull...

TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_SERIOUSMAN03356_000_041<tab>I've never heard the likes of it. If there truly exists a sea witch who murders sailors with her cursed screams, then that is how I imagine her voice would sound.
TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_SERIOUSMAN03356_000_042<tab>At least now we know which areas are too dangerous to approach. Come, we must return to Wright so I can share this with the others.

TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_SYSTEM_000_043<tab>The farmer seems to be in no state to talk. Perhaps you can <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>soothe<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> him with a few calming words...

TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_SYSTEM_000_044<tab>The farmer seems to be in no state to talk. Perhaps you can <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>soothe<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> him with a few calming words...

TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_SERIOUSMAN03356_000_050<tab>Now that I've had a chance to calm down, I feel a little embarrassed by my earlier behavior. I think stories of sea witches and the like may have fed my panic...

TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_SERIOUSMAN03356_000_051<tab>But not everyone puts stock in those old tales, it seems. There was talk of a girl from Gatetown who's taken to visiting the lighthouse to practice her sing─ Wait... You don't think that awful keening could have been...? No, surely not...

TEXT_LUCKZA014_03356_SERIOUSMAN03356_000_052<tab>Ahaha...hahaha. Ahem. Thank you for standing by me during that terrifying ordeal. And be wary of wailing sea witches should you find yourself near the Clave again!
